message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. What do you say?
Let's meet in the middle, Alice!
You were willing to meet in the middle last round, so I'm willing to compromise again. What do you think?
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, Alice. Take it or leave it!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, Bob. This is a good opportunity for you to take the lead. What do you think?
I'm starting to get impatient, Alice. I think I've given you enough chances to make a deal. Take it or leave it!
